attributes.action: Ask the Police to change the rule which says that the Police do not need to show someone the photographic evidence when they are allegedly seen speeding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not live in a Police State.  If this is not just a money making scheme they should be open and honest about what people have done and they should be allowed to see evidence against them.  People are often frightened of the police and things like this don't help!
